films.title: Into the Bad Lands
films.description: A mighty warrior and a young boy with supernatural powers search for enlightenment in a ruthless post-apocalyptic America controlled by feudal barons.

films.title: Heart of Stone
films.description: Heart of Stone is a 2023 American spy action thriller film directed by Tom Harper from a screenplay by Greg Rucka and Allison Schroeder and a story by Rucka.

films.title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
films.description: It is the sequel to Mission: Impossible – Fallout (2018) and the seventh installment in the Mission: Impossible film series.

films.title: Black Panther 1
films.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his..

films.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
films.description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever is a 2022 American superhero film based on Marvel Comics featuring the character Shuri / Black Panther.

films.title: Track Of The Moon Beast
films.description: A young man is transformed into a hideous 'moon beast' due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.

films.title: The Skydivers
films.description: A woman seeks revenge on her former lover, who owns a skydiving business.

films.title: The Killer Shrews
films.description: On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.

films.title: Project Moon Base
films.description: A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.

films.title: The Giant Spider Invasion
films.description: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

films.title: Catalina Caper
films.description: A group of swingin' teens take time out from having fun in the sun to try to foil a group of crooks searching for a stolen scroll.

films.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
films.description: John Wick: Chapter 4 is a 2023 American neo-noir action thriller film directed and co-produced by Chad Stahelski and written by Shay Hatten and Michael Finch.

films.title: Venom: The Last Dance
films.description: Venom: The Last Dance is a 2024 American superhero film written and directed by Kelly Marcel, which features the Marvel Comics character Venom.

films.title: Last Ship
films.description: The Last Ship is an American action drama television series, loosely based on the 1988 novel of the same name by William Brinkley.

films.title: Halo
films.description: Halo is an American military science fiction television series developed by Kyle Killen and Steven Kane for the streaming service Paramount+.

films.title: Silo
films.description: Silo is an American science fiction dystopian drama television series created by Graham Yost, based on the Silo trilogy of novels (Wool, Shift, and Dust) by author Hugh Howey.
